00034 #ifndef RPL_PRIVATE_H
00035 #define RPL_PRIVATE_H
00036 
00037 /*
00038  * ContikiRPL - an implementation of the routing protocol for low power and
00039  * lossy networks. See: draft-ietf-roll-rpl-17.
00040  *
00041  * --
00042  * The DIOs handle prefix information option for setting global IP addresses
00043  * on the nodes, but the current handling is not awaiting the join of the DAG
00044  * so it does not currently support multiple DAGs.
00045  */
00046 
00047 #include "net/rpl/rpl.h"
00048 
00049 #include "lib/list.h"
00050 #include "net/uip.h"
00051 #include "sys/clock.h"
00052 #include "sys/ctimer.h"
00053 #include "net/uip-ds6.h"
00054 
00055 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 /** \brief Is IPv6 address a the link local all rpl nodes multicast address */
00057 #define uip_is_addr_linklocal_rplnodes_mcast(a)     \
00058   ((((a)->u8[0]) == 0xff) &&                        \
00059    (((a)->u8[1]) == 0x02) &&                        \
00060    (((a)->u16[1]) == 0) &&                          \
00061    (((a)->u16[2]) == 0) &&                          \
00062    (((a)->u16[3]) == 0) &&                          \
00063    (((a)->u16[4]) == 0) &&                          \
00064    (((a)->u16[5]) == 0) &&                          \
00065    (((a)->u16[6]) == 0) &&                          \
00066    (((a)->u8[14]) == 0) &&                          \
00067    (((a)->u8[15]) == 0x1a))
00068 
00069 /** \brief set IP address a to the link local all-rpl nodes multicast address */
00070 #define uip_create_linklocal_rplnodes_mcast(a) uip_ip6addr(a, 0xff02, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0x001a)
00071 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00072 /* RPL message types */
00073 #define RPL_CODE_DIS                   0x00   /* DAG Information Solicitation */
00074 #define RPL_CODE_DIO                   0x01   /* DAG Information Option */
00075 #define RPL_CODE_DAO                   0x02   /* Destination Advertisement Option */
00076 #define RPL_CODE_DAO_ACK               0x03   /* DAO acknowledgment */
00077 #define RPL_CODE_SEC_DIS               0x80   /* Secure DIS */
00078 #define RPL_CODE_SEC_DIO               0x81   /* Secure DIO */
00079 #define RPL_CODE_SEC_DAO               0x82   /* Secure DAO */
00080 #define RPL_CODE_SEC_DAO_ACK           0x83   /* Secure DAO ACK */
00081 
00082 /* RPL control message options. */
00083 #define RPL_OPTION_PAD1                 0
00084 #define RPL_OPTION_PADN                 1
00085 #define RPL_OPTION_DAG_METRIC_CONTAINER 2
00086 #define RPL_OPTION_ROUTE_INFO           3
00087 #define RPL_OPTION_DAG_CONF             4
00088 #define RPL_OPTION_TARGET               5
00089 #define RPL_OPTION_TRANSIT              6
00090 #define RPL_OPTION_SOLICITED_INFO       7
00091 #define RPL_OPTION_PREFIX_INFO          8
00092 #define RPL_OPTION_TARGET_DESC          9
00093 
00094 #define RPL_DAO_K_FLAG                   0x80 /* DAO ACK requested */
00095 #define RPL_DAO_D_FLAG                   0x40 /* DODAG ID present */
00096 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 /* Default values for RPL constants and variables. */
00098 
00099 /* The default value for the DAO timer. */
00100 #define DEFAULT_DAO_LATENCY             (CLOCK_SECOND * 8)
00101 
00102 /* Special value indicating immediate removal. */
00103 #define ZERO_LIFETIME                   0
00104 
00105 /* Default route lifetime unit. */
00106 #define RPL_DEFAULT_LIFETIME_UNIT       0xffff
00107 
00108 /* Default route lifetime as a multiple of the lifetime unit. */
00109 #define RPL_DEFAULT_LIFETIME        0xff
00110 
00111 #define RPL_LIFETIME(dag, lifetime) \
00112           ((unsigned long)(dag)->lifetime_unit * lifetime)
00113 
00114 #ifndef RPL_CONF_MIN_HOPRANKINC
00115 #define DEFAULT_MIN_HOPRANKINC          256
00116 #else
00117 #define DEFAULT_MIN_HOPRANKINC RPL_CONF_MIN_HOPRANKINC
00118 #endif
00119 #define DEFAULT_MAX_RANKINC             (3 * DEFAULT_MIN_HOPRANKINC)
00120 
00121 #define DAG_RANK(fixpt_rank, dag)       ((fixpt_rank) / (dag)->min_hoprankinc)
00122 
00123 /* Rank of a virtual root node that coordinates DAG root nodes. */
00124 #define BASE_RANK                       0
00125 
00126 /* Rank of a root node. */
00127 #define ROOT_RANK(dag)                  (dag)->min_hoprankinc
00128 
00129 #define INFINITE_RANK                   0xffff
00130 
00131 #define INITIAL_LINK_METRIC             NEIGHBOR_INFO_ETX2FIX(5)
00132 
00133 /* Represents 2^n ms. */
00134 /* Default value according to the specification is 3 which
00135    means 8 milliseconds, but that is an unreasonable value if
00136    using power-saving / duty-cycling    */
00137 #ifdef RPL_CONF_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN
00138 #define DEFAULT_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN        RPL_CONF_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN
00139 #else
00140 #define DEFAULT_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN        12
00141 #endif
00142 
00143 /* Maximum amount of timer doublings. */
00144 #ifdef RPL_CONF_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS
00145 #define DEFAULT_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS  RPL_CONF_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS
00146 #else
00147 #define DEFAULT_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS  8
00148 #endif
00149 
00150 /* Default DIO redundancy. */
00151 #ifdef RPL_CONF_DIO_REDUNDANCY
00152 #define DEFAULT_DIO_REDUNDANCY          RPL_CONF_DIO_REDUNDANCY
00153 #else
00154 #define DEFAULT_DIO_REDUNDANCY          10
00155 #endif
00156 
00157 /* Expire DAOs from neighbors that do not respond in this time. (seconds) */
00158 #define DAO_EXPIRATION_TIMEOUT          60
00159 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00160 #define RPL_INSTANCE_LOCAL_FLAG         0x80
00161 #define RPL_INSTANCE_D_FLAG             0x40
00162 
00163 /* Values that tell where a route came from. */
00164 #define RPL_ROUTE_FROM_INTERNAL         0
00165 #define RPL_ROUTE_FROM_UNICAST_DAO      1
00166 #define RPL_ROUTE_FROM_MULTICAST_DAO    2
00167 #define RPL_ROUTE_FROM_DIO              3
00168 
00169 /* DAG Mode of Operation */
00170 #define RPL_MOP_NO_DOWNWARD_ROUTES      0
00171 #define RPL_MOP_NON_STORING             1
00172 #define RPL_MOP_STORING_NO_MULTICAST    2
00173 #define RPL_MOP_STORING_MULTICAST       3
00174 
00175 #ifdef  RPL_CONF_MOP
00176 #define RPL_MOP_DEFAULT                 RPL_CONF_MOP
00177 #else
00178 #define RPL_MOP_DEFAULT                 RPL_MOP_STORING_NO_MULTICAST
00179 #endif
00180 
00181 /*
00182  * The ETX in the metric container is expressed as a fixed-point value 
00183  * whose integer part can be obtained by dividing the value by 
00184  * RPL_DAG_MC_ETX_DIVISOR.
00185  */
00186 #define RPL_DAG_MC_ETX_DIVISOR          128
00187 
00188 /* DIS related */
00189 #define RPL_DIS_SEND                    1
00190 #ifdef  RPL_DIS_INTERVAL_CONF
00191 #define RPL_DIS_INTERVAL                RPL_DIS_INTERVAL_CONF
00192 #else
00193 #define RPL_DIS_INTERVAL                60
00194 #endif
00195 #define RPL_DIS_START_DELAY             5
00196 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00197 /* Logical representation of a DAG Information Object (DIO.) */
00198 struct rpl_dio {
00199   uip_ipaddr_t dag_id;
00200   rpl_ocp_t ocp;
00201   rpl_rank_t rank;
00202   uint8_t grounded;
00203   uint8_t mop;
00204   uint8_t preference;
00205   uint8_t version;
00206   uint8_t instance_id;
00207   uint8_t dtsn;
00208   uint8_t dag_intdoubl;
00209   uint8_t dag_intmin;
00210   uint8_t dag_redund;
00211   rpl_lifetime_t default_lifetime;
00212   uint16_t lifetime_unit;
00213   rpl_rank_t dag_max_rankinc;
00214   rpl_rank_t dag_min_hoprankinc;
00215   rpl_prefix_t destination_prefix;
00216   rpl_prefix_t prefix_info;
00217   struct rpl_metric_container mc;
00218 };
00219 typedef struct rpl_dio rpl_dio_t;
00220 
00221 #if RPL_CONF_STATS
00222 /* Statistics for fault management. */
00223 struct rpl_stats {
00224   uint16_t mem_overflows;
00225   uint16_t local_repairs;
00226   uint16_t global_repairs;
00227   uint16_t malformed_msgs;
00228   uint16_t resets;
00229   uint16_t parent_switch;
00230 };
00231 typedef struct rpl_stats rpl_stats_t;
00232 
00233 extern rpl_stats_t rpl_stats;
00234 #endif

00248 void dao_ack_output(rpl_dag_t *, uip_ipaddr_t *, uint8_t);
00249 void uip_rpl_input(void);

00253 void rpl_local_repair(rpl_dag_t *dag);

00255 void rpl_process_dio(uip_ipaddr_t *, rpl_dio_t *);
00256 int rpl_process_parent_event(rpl_dag_t *, rpl_parent_t *);

00260 void rpl_free_dag(rpl_dag_t *);
00261 
00262 /* DAG parent management function. */
00263 rpl_parent_t *rpl_add_parent(rpl_dag_t *, rpl_dio_t *dio, uip_ipaddr_t *);
00264 rpl_parent_t *rpl_find_parent(rpl_dag_t *, uip_ipaddr_t *);
00265 int rpl_remove_parent(rpl_dag_t *, rpl_parent_t *);
00266 rpl_parent_t *rpl_select_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag);
00267 void rpl_recalculate_ranks(void);
00268 
00269 /* RPL routing table functions. */
00270 void rpl_remove_routes(rpl_dag_t *dag);
00271 uip_ds6_route_t *rpl_add_route(rpl_dag_t *dag, uip_ipaddr_t *prefix,
00272                                int prefix_len, uip_ipaddr_t *next_hop);
00273 void rpl_purge_routes(void);
00274 
00275 /* Objective function. */
00276 rpl_of_t *rpl_find_of(rpl_ocp_t);
00277 
00278 /* Timer functions. */
00279 void rpl_schedule_dao(rpl_dag_t *);
00280 void rpl_reset_dio_timer(rpl_dag_t *, uint8_t);
00281 void rpl_reset_periodic_timer(void);

00283 /* Route poisoning. */
00284 void rpl_poison_routes(rpl_dag_t *, rpl_parent_t *);
